tr.td: Burn of first degree of wrist and hand

value.displayName: Burn of first degree of wrist and hand

section.title: ADMISSION DIAGNOSIS
section.text: Burn of first degree of wrist and hand

value.displayName: Burn of first degree of wrist and hand

text.paragraph: Patient has no history of implantable devices

section.title: RESULTS/DIAGNOSTIC IMAGING REPORTS
section.text: Laboratory Test: None needed. Laboratory Values/Results: No Lab Result information. Diagnostic Imaging Reports: No information.

section.title: ASSESSMENTS
section.text: The patient Mr John Wright was found to have first degree burns and Dr Seven and his staff Mr Wong by cleaning the burn and dressing the burn and observed for couple of hours before discharging Mr Wong.

tr.td: Schedule an appointment with Dr Seven after 1 week for Follow up with Outpatient facility.

observation.text: Schedule an appointment with Dr Seven after 1 week for Follow up with Outpatient facility.

substanceAdministration.text: In case of high fever, take Tylenol according to the following.

list.item: Appointments: Schedule an appointment with Dr Seven after 1 week. Follow up with Outpatient facility.
In case of fever, take Tylenol as advised in plan of treatment.
